name: Back Er In
description:
Why drive forward when you can BACK!

Grab your keys, slam it in reverse, and back your trailer to the goal in a variety of vehicles. 

Endure a shameful deduction of points for clipping obstacles or *Gasp* Jack-Knifing.

Balance the need for speed with a clean run for the best score.

Notes

Made as part of Trijam #189

Hours Used

Ben - 4.0

Drew - 2.0
